Series.Actors: |Sarah Michelle Gellar|Ioan Gruffudd|Nestor Carbonell|Kristoffer Polaha|Andrea Roth|Billy Miller|Chris Elwood|Darren Pettie|Gage Golightly|Gregory Harrison|Jaime Murray|Jason Dohring|Justin Bruening|Mike Colter|Sean Patrick Thomas|Tara Summers|Zahn McClarnon|Zoey Deutch|
Series.Overview: Bridget goes on the run after witnessing a murder, hiding out by assuming the life of her wealthy identical twin sister Siobhan - only to learn that her sister's seemingly idyllic life is just as complicated and dangerous as the one she's trying to leave behind.
